title: First win of the Day mission has disappeared from under level 30 accounts
body:
https://i.imgur.com/5Bw08Oq.png

It's gone, I can't level up properly on my account.

replies.body:
Can you guys tell me why im getting so little blue essence? Ive leveled 2 times and in total got only 400 BE
2 LEVELS. Basically 200 per level which is basically nothing because i wouldve gotten that in 2 games on the old IP system
Please fix this
I have the same problem too on my level 10 account
Friend is having this issue as well, seems like it is certainly a bug considering I have it on my accounts.
yup, I saw a reddit post as well where a group of people also had the issue.
Hey guys, First Win of The Day mission start at level 15.  Sorry for the confusion!

Thanks for letting us know.

Would it be possible to add that to this page, so people know in the future?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-BE-XP-System-Breakdown#h5
Thanks for the info. Right now i got 400 BE worth of stuff when i level up from 10 to 11 in a capsule. Isn't it suppose to be around 900 BE per level up?

> [{quoted}](name=Celestial Vayne,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VEBtvLRy,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-11-09T18:03:56.262+0000)
>
> Thanks for the info. Right now i got 400 BE worth of stuff when i level up from 10 to 11 in a capsule. Isn't it suppose to be around 900 BE per level up?

Not sure how it works but Id say 900 be is what it should be on average but it makes since for the lower level rewards to be ryze mumu garen ashe brand etc and hopefully get better later on
then why did i get he quest for some lvls before lvl 15 then suddenly it dissapeared ? ( currently lvl 10 )
I'm guessing it's a bug. There is a whole lot going on after the preseason changes rolled out.
It seems that they changed when FWOTD is available?  My new account is now at level 10 and I just received the mission.  Today is also when 8.3 went live so perhaps it came with the patch?
Same problem on this account but my other account which is level 20 has that mission.
